'''Guidance of the Land of Wind''' is one of the [[Guidance of the Land]] boxes that can be obtained from purchasing the Gnostic Hymn or Gnostic Chorus packages for [[Battle Pass]].

{{See also|Philosophies of the Land of Wind}}
After reaching the prerequisite levels, collecting the box will prompt you to choose one of the following:
{{Card|Guide to Freedom|5}}
{{Card|Guide to Resistance|5}}
{{Card|Guide to Ballad|5}}
